# Page1

## Row {height=70%}

```{python}
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import plotly.express as px
from palmerpenguins import load_penguins

penguins = load_penguins()
# penguins.head()

fig = px.scatter(
    penguins,
    x="bill_length_mm",
    y="bill_depth_mm",
    color="species",
    # trendline = 'ols',
)

fig
```
